<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shoving Sweep](/Feats.aspx?ID=6370) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=256)

**Prerequisites**
[Mauler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6368); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Trigger**
An enemy within your reach leaves a square during a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action it’s using.

**Requirements**
You’re wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

</column>

---

You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back. You attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) the triggering creature, ignoring the requirement that you have a hand free. Unless you critically succeed at your check, the creature continues its movement after the Shove.
name: Shoving Sweep
requirement: You’re wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
